article_title: Israeli hostages status hangs over Gaza truce talks
sentence: Pressure  for  a  deal  intensified  after  Thursday's  incident  outside  Gaza  City  in  the  north  of  the  territory  where  at  least  112  people  were  killed  as  crowds  rushed  an  aid  convoy.

article_title: Israeli hostages status hangs over Gaza truce talks
sentence: Dr  Mohamed  Salha,  interim  hospital  manager  at  al-Awda  hospital,  where  many  of  the  dead  and  injured  were  taken,  told  the  BBC:  "Al-Awda  hospital  received  around  176  injured  people. . .  142  of  these  cases  are  bullet  injuries  and  the  rest  are  from  the  stampede  and  broken  limbs  in  the  upper  and  lower  body  parts.  "

article_title: Israeli hostages status hangs over Gaza truce talks
sentence: What  video  and  eyewitness  accounts  tell  us  about  Gazans  killed  at  aid  drop  Hamas  is  reported  to  have  said  that  an  agreement  on  a  truce  could  be  reached  within  the  next  24  to  48  hours,  with  a  source  from  the  group  telling  Egyptian  media  a  deal  depended  on  Israel  agreeing  to  its  demands.

article_title: Israeli hostages status hangs over Gaza truce talks
sentence: The  Israel  military  launched  a  large-scale  air  and  ground  campaign  to  destroy  Hamas  after  its  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel  on  7  October  and  took  253  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Israeli hostages status hangs over Gaza truce talks
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  at  least  30,410  people,  including  21,000  children  and  women,  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then  with  some  7,000  missing  and  71,700  injured.

article_title: Israeli hostages status hangs over Gaza truce talks
sentence: At  least  11  people  were  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  at  a  camp  for  displaced  people  in  Rafah  in  southern  Gaza  on  Saturday,  according  to  Hamas.
